text:
Hey hey, look who it is! You really do look like 
you belong here - I'd say you're nearing the end 
of my lessons!

So, let's hear it: What's the most important part of 
being a haunted house?
You got it in one! I taught you well.

Certainly an important part of it for some of us, 
but the number one requirement is simple: 
having a good time!

Wow, you're really still stuck on that, huh? ...Fun. 
The answer is fun. Foreign concept, I know.

Fun's the name of the game, at the end of the day. 
Livin' carefree, embracing the darker side of things 
and finding the comedy in it... that's what it's all about.

Yeah! That's exactly it! I've met many a 
haunted house in my day, but never one who gets it 
quite like you do.

At first, I was just hoping to kill some time with you. 
Who coulda guessed I'd find a new partner in crime?

Give it a shot, you might like it. Easy to filter out 
the things that aren't important when you understand 
how few things are.

Anyways, we were talking about fun! On that topic, how 
about we get out of here? No reason to stop hanging out just 
cause you're a bona fide haunted house now.

Oh, so different equals weird, huh? Blegh. Guess I know 
what flavor of haunted house you've become. The gross kind.

Enough of the joking insults - you completely and utterly 
bore me. I held up my end of the bargain, so get lost.
